Package ec.app.experiments.WaveletExperiment.wavelets

Class wavelet_base

java.lang.Object
ec.app.experiments.WaveletExperiment.wavelets.wavelet_base
Direct Known Subclasses:
inplace_haar, simple_haar
abstract class wavelet_base extends Object

Wavelet base class

The wavelet base class supplies the common functions power2 and log2 and defines the abstract methods for the derived classes.

Author:
Ian Kaplan
See Also:
  • Wavelets Made Easy by Yves Nieverglt, Birkhauser, 1999
